titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on nightlights of plastic.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 5/26/2011--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on nightlights of plastic.
